page.title: 11INTERVIEW WITH FARMER'S WIFE
page.content:
Mandy is a farmer's wife and a full time registered child minder, she has two children also to look after.
"I am a registered child minder and look after about five to six children a day, five days a week with only Wednesday to tidy the house. I get up at about five to six o' clock in the morning and start work at nine o' clock and work till about half past five which is forty hours a week. Although my job is hard it is also enormous fun. I have thought about moving to be a nursery nurse. Before we moved here I worked in a supermarket. Now looking back I don't know how I stuck it, I much much prefer the job I have now, I had wanted to work with horses as I once had one but other things made me change my mind. I never help my
